title: Deseret News
additional-note: A 1975 renewal for the 1947 book 'Exodus to Greatness' by Preston Nibley mentions that portions of the book were previously published as articles in the Deseret News between 1945 and 1947.  We do not know the date of those publications, but this renewal could conceivably renew the copyright of articles published in 1947 that are included in the book.
